nodes.bodyText: I'm reluctant to make config optional. The odds are very high that someone trying to exclude it will generate a broken config.  OpenTracing doesn't require it, but if all you want is OT then just specify that.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,8 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" ?>
 <layer-spec xmlns="urn:jboss:galleon:layer-spec:1.0" name="observability">
     <dependencies>
-        <layer name="microprofile-config"/>
-        <layer name="microprofile-metrics"/>
+        <layer name="microprofile-config" optional="true"/>

nodes.bodyText: Further to my last point; this layer has the health subsystem as a fixed feature group, not an excludable layer and health requires config.
